name: Bechained PRO !
description:
*** One of Best Finger-sliding and Chaining jewels elimination game on AppStore ***

Slide your finger to create chains of three or more jewels until background tiles are destroyed and the BEE comes down. Keep linking jewels to make the BEE fall down to win the game.

***** All Unlocked, +FREE 15 Bee bombs, 15 missiles and 15 Timers *****

In Blitz Mode, Make highest score as possible in 60 seconds !

***** Features *****
* Universal build: iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch
* Blitz Mode with 10 levels for Hour of Fun
* 3 Specials tools to help you complete levels
* 100 Levels across 5 Stages (more coming soon)
* +20 Levels bonus
* +20 Levels when reach blitz level 10
* Jewel Pack available (Candy Pack, Fruit Pack, Zombie Pack)
* Stunning HD Graphic retina
* Game Center achievements and leaderboard
* Facebook Integration
* Easy to learn but hard to master

If you like this game, please rate it and recommend it to your friends.

Thanks for playing!
